decks.notes: Utilizing a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw, this Dimir Control deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily building card advantage and controlling the board. By efficiently controlling the opponent's threats and maintaining card advantage through card draw and graveyard recursion, this deck seeks to outvalue the opponent and eventually win through incremental advantage. With a focus on disrupting the opponent's plans and efficiently dealing with threats, this deck aims to outlast the opponent and secure victory through superior resource management.

This deck focuses on utilizing cards like Persist and Indomitable Creativity to cheat big creatures like Archon of Cruelty onto the battlefield quickly. It also includes disruption elements like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to be creative in its combo approach, utilizing versatile cards like Wrenn and Six and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to generate value and control the board. With a mix of removal, card draw, and powerful creatures, this deck seeks to outpace and overwhelm the opponent in a unique and creative way.

The deck focuses on assembling a powerful equipment combo using cards like Colossus Hammer, Puresteel Paladin, and Stoneforge Mystic to quickly equip creatures with powerful equipment. Cards like Esper Sentinel and Sigarda's Aid help control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Inkmoth Nexus provides an alternative win condition by turning into an infect creature. The deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with big, equipped creatures while controlling the board to secure victory.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays along with burn spells and control elements to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The deck utilizes powerful cards like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to deal damage rapidly, while also including utility cards like Thraben Charm and Static Prison to control the board. With a mix of powerful creatures, burn spells, and control elements, this deck aims to win the game quickly before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble the combo pieces of Underworld Breach, Grinding Station, and Emry, Lurker of the Loch to create a loop that allows for infinite milling and casting of spells from the graveyard. By utilizing cards like Mishra's Bauble and Mox Amber to generate mana and draw cards, the deck aims to power through the opponent's deck and win through a combination of milling, damage, and overwhelming card advantage. Additionally, the deck includes disruptive elements like Malevolent Rumble and Unholy Heat to control the board and protect the combo.

This deck focuses on quickly casting powerful spells with Cascade mechanics, chaining spells together to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing cards like Ardent Plea and Shardless Agent, the deck can consistently cast powerful spells for free while controlling the board with Force of Negation and Leyline of the Guildpact. The deck aims to quickly assemble a board presence with cards like Crashing Footfalls and Scion of Draco, while using disruptive spells like Subtlety to maintain control of the game.

This deck focuses on utilizing Eldrazi creatures to ramp up mana quickly and control the game with powerful spells and abilities. By using cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Kozilek's Command, the deck is able to disrupt opponents while building up to play big threats like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. The combination of ramp and control elements makes it difficult for opponents to keep up with the deck's fast mana production and disruptive plays.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and removal spells. The key strategy is to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, while maintaining a strong board presence with creatures like Guide of Souls and Ocelot Pride. The deck also utilizes cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to deal damage and pressure the opponent. With a mix of efficient threats and disruption, this deck aims to win the game quickly and decisively.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying low-cost creatures with high power and utilizing Leyline cards to enhance their abilities. It also includes Tribal Flames for direct damage and Stubborn Denial for protection. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and control the board with Leyline Binding. Key cards like Scion of Draco and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer provide additional synergies and power to the deck's strategy. The mana base is optimized for consistent casting of spells and creatures while maintaining flexibility in color options.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using a combination of low-cost aggressive creatures like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear, along with direct damage spells like Lightning Bolt, Lava Spike, and Boros Charm. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast and efficient damage output, while also having some burn spells to control the board and prevent the opponent from gaining life. The mana base is optimized for consistency and speed, with a mix of fetch lands and dual lands to ensure the right colors are available when needed.
